title: 🏟 "The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do." - Kobe Bryant
content: Last week I had you implement a function that checked if an input is a factorial. Great job Becker, Ivana, Katherine, Ten, Sophie, Jesse, Jehiel, Nwosa, Denis, Gamal, Oswaldo, Michael, Klára, Samy, Austin, Joel, Hunter, Jose, Qais, Dimitris, Carlo, Leslie, Uzair, and Rubén!is a puzzler! Write a function that prints “Hello, world!” but doesn’t repeat any characters in the program. The program should not use any character more than once (except whitespace, I’ll allow that)!
